amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated by this Act may be used by the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation to enforce section 4010(c) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used by the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation to enforce section 4010(c) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 148 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. George Miller.
